item.title: Introduction to JavaScript Promises
item.description: JavaScript promises have become a popular way to handle the tangled mess that JavaScriptâ€™s asynchronous nature often creates for us. Synchronous code is eaiser to follow and debug, async is better for flexibiity. Promises are becomming a big part of the JavaScript world, with awesome APIs implemented with it.
